greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = -(-1)^n times sum of divisors of n.
link: Indranil Ghosh, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
László Tóth, Alternating sums concerning multiplicative arithmetic functions, arXiv preprint arXiv:1608.00795 [math.NT], 2016.
formula: a(n) is multiplicative with a(2^e) = 1 - 2^(e+1) if e > 0, a(p^e) = (p^(e+1) - 1) / (p - 1) if p > 2.
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Aug 09 2008
